title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Life Sciences-Based Advanced HIV/AIDS Education: Simulation/

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain structural characteristics of the HIV virus and its host cell infection mechanisms at the molecular level
Learners can analyze HIV/AIDS transmission pathways and develop prevention strategies through VR simulations
Learners can critically evaluate scientific data related to HIV/AIDS by writing reports in academic paper format
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
